headline: 2 Stocks Insider Keep Buying
summary: It can be a good idea for traders and long-term investors to keep tabs on what insiders (think directors, the CEO, CFO, and a whole bunch of other executives) are up to when it comes to their own shares. Undoubtedly, there may be a ton of reasons as to why an executive would sell shares ... 2 Stocks Insider Keep Buying

headline: Here’s What Pressured CarMax (KMX) in Q3
summary: Diamond Hill Capital, an investment management company, released its “Select Fund” third-quarter 2025 investor letter. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. Markets continued their YTD rally in the third quarter, with the Russell 3000 Index surging 8%. At the same time, the portfolio underperformed the Russell 3000 Index, returning 4.98%. To get […]

headline: How CarMax's (KMX) Shift from S&P 500 to S&P 600 May Affect Investor Positioning
summary: S&P Dow Jones Indices recently announced that CarMax has been removed from the S&P 500 following Honeywell's spinoff of Solstice Advance Materials, and is now part of the S&P 600 index. This index reclassification reflects changes in CarMax's market capitalization and triggers investment shifts among institutional managers tracking these benchmarks. We’ll examine how CarMax’s move from the S&P 500 to the S&P 600 may influence its investment outlook and position. These 11 companies survived...

headline: 5 Stocks That Remain Undervalued With Long-Term Growth Potential
summary: Ariel Investments highlights undervalued growth in smart home, entertainment, and fintech holdings. See which stocks they believe offer long-term upside this quarter.
